title: Updated Chic Community! High End Finishes! Covered Parking!
posting_body: The Lifestyle You Deserve At Amherst
Escape to this enchanting apartment in Bedford, Texas.
1 and 2-bedroom homes offer unique floor plans design to provide you with an enjoyable atmosphere, nestled in an established neighborhood.

Featuring SMART home technology that welcomes you home and offers you even more security and convenience with Keyless Door Locks, Programmable Thermostats, Monitored Alarm Security, Water Leak Sensors, and integration with other SMART devices.
Our premier community features 2 refreshing swimming pools, state-of-the-art fitness facility, business center, and more.
Tucked away from the busy city life, Amherst is just a freeway away from entertainment, dining, and a variety of retail shopping.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
